title: AIMO Evidence Bundle Manifest Schema
description: Schema for Evidence Bundle manifest.json. Root descriptor with object_index, payload_index, hash_chain, and signing. v0.1 normative.

object_index.description: List of enumerated objects (id, type, path, sha256). Paths MUST be relative, MUST NOT contain ../ or start with /. Paths MUST remain within the Evidence Bundle root; validators MUST reject paths that escape the bundle root.

path.description: Relative path within bundle root; MUST NOT contain ../ (path traversal prevention) or start with /.

payload_index.description: List of payloads (logical_id, path, sha256, mime, size). Paths MUST be relative, MUST NOT contain ../ or start with /. Paths MUST remain within the Evidence Bundle root; validators MUST reject paths that escape the bundle root.

path.description: Relative path within bundle root; MUST NOT contain ../ or start with /.

hash_chain.description: Hash chain head and algorithm. v0.1 normative: algorithm, head, path (under hashes/), and covers (v0.1 MUST include manifest.json and objects/index.json).

head.description: Chain head (64 lowercase hex for sha256).

path.description: Relative path under hashes/; MUST NOT contain ../ or start with /.

covers.description: List of bundle paths covered by this chain. v0.1 MUST include manifest.json and objects/index.json.

signing.description: Signing metadata. v0.1 normative: signatures array with explicit reference (path, targets, algorithm). Cryptographic verification is out of scope for v0.1.

signatures.description: List of signature entries. Each entry MUST reference a file under signatures/ and its targets. v0.1 MUST include at least one signature whose targets include manifest.json.

signature_id.description: Unique identifier for this signature (e.g. SIG-001 or UUID).

path.description: Relative path under signatures/; MUST NOT contain ../ or start with /.

targets.description: Bundle paths that this signature covers. v0.1 MUST include manifest.json in at least one signature.

algorithm.description: Signature algorithm. v0.1 allows unspecified for future extension.
